title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, May 12, 2021
description: “Writing, getting something down on the page, is a gratification that, like a child faced with a candy bar and an empty stomach, I have trouble postponing.” –Rosellen Brown, 1939
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Writing, getting something down on the page, is a gratification that, like a child faced with a candy bar and an empty stomach, I have trouble postponing.” –Rosellen Brown, 1939
